name: abv1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ DivRing ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c1 ` c3)= 1)
⊣ c3 =(1r ` c0)

comment: The absolute value of one is one in a division ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2014.)
